text: Welcome back! Rachel McAdams turned heads as she hit her first red carpet on Tuesday, April 24, since secretly welcoming her first child. The Game Night actress, 39, was on hand to promote her new film, Disobedience, at the Tribeca Film Festival in NYC. She wore a sheer Giambattista Valli dress, which was detailed with ruffles, floral embellishments and a deep V - neckline. McAdams was joined by her costar Rachel Weisz at the event. Weisz announced earlier this month that she is expecting her first child with husband Daniel Craig.
